file_content.text: You know what I require. We will speak again.
You summoned me, Lord Jadus?
Yes. You have maneuvered well against our enemies in the Republic, and served me capably since my ascension.
But I have watched the signs of convergence and seen the war to come. Your role must change if you are to remain useful.
What is it that you wish, my lord?
As you decree.
What is the future of the war?
Tell me what you foresee.
Cataclysm. I have deciphered the Emperor's plans, and whether they succeed or fail, I emerge stronger. For now, however, I must remove myself from the field of conflict.
I've been through fire out there. I served more than "capably."
That's all the thanks I get?
You acted as required. There was no other to destroy the Shadow Arsenal.
In the days ahead, I shall remove myself from the field of conflict. Let the Emperor and the Dark Council command the fleets while I pursue other matters.
You will keep the galaxy during my absence. You will have my authority, but not my protection.
I swear, your trust is not misplaced.
I will remain loyal.
Good. You will know all you require in time.
While I'm acting as your Hand, what will you be doing?
Where are you going?
Preparing for the future. You do not require the details.
You're leaving me behind, after all I've done.
You're abandoning me.
Someone must remain. It is your honor and burden.
I see the shape of the galaxy as only five others can. To intervene directly would be costly and pointless, but I do not abandon the game.
Trust that the time of my return shall come, and that your obedience, as ever, will be rewarded.
I hear and obey.
Very well, my lord.
There's much we haven't gone over. There were incidents during my battle with Ardun Kothe. Now Intelligence has found something new....
We need to discuss my mission.
You have my authority. Use it. And if you deem these conspirators worth your attention, find and destroy them.
I agreed to serve you in return for influence and power! Now you're running away?
You can't do this!
My patience is limited.
As for the latest request from the Minister of Intelligence... if you deem these conspirators worth your attention, find and destroy them.
But choose our enemies carefully. There is neither time nor opportunity for mistakes.
Be on your way.
